Text: The song, Echoes on this album is being used as the theme tune for a brand new drama comedy by E4 and Channel 4, Misfits. Awesome series, awesome theme. Thanks for the upload!

Wow this was uploaded on 2005. Real nice. I'm actually a new fan of The Rapture (In The Grace of Your Love) and recently discovered Misfits. So I was glad to find out that the song they were using as the opening theme was The Rapture's older stuff.
